item.title: Setup Personal MediaServer Using RaspberryPi and MiniDLNA
item.description: Few weeks back my sister ordered a raspberry pi so that she could get started with linux and small DIY projects in electronics. As we didn’t have any modules/sensors/components needed for electronics projects; we decided that we will setup a media server using the RPi, we already have a 1TB external Hard Disk drive; which can be used for the storage. There were a lot of different tools to implement it, some of them are:
